title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 130 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 130 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Out of the depths have I cried unto thee, O LORD.
lineList.cn: （上行之诗）耶和华阿，我从深处向你求告。

lineList.en: Lord, hear my voice: let thine ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications.
lineList.cn: 主阿，求你听我的声音。愿你侧耳听我恳求的声音。

lineList.en: If thou, LORD, shouldest mark iniquities, O Lord, who shall stand?
lineList.cn: 主耶和华阿，你若究察罪孽，谁能站得住呢。

lineList.en: But there is forgiveness with thee, that thou mayest be feared.
lineList.cn: 但在你有赦免之恩，要叫人敬畏你。

lineList.en: I wait for the LORD, my soul doth wait, and in his word do I hope.
lineList.cn: 我等候耶和华，我的心等候。我也仰望他的话。

lineList.en: My soul waiteth for the Lord more than they that watch for the morning: I say, more than they that watch for the morning.
lineList.cn: 我的心等候主，胜于守夜的，等候天亮，胜于守夜的，等候天亮。

lineList.en: Let Israel hope in the LORD: for with the LORD there is mercy, and with him is plenteous redemption.
lineList.cn: 以色列阿，你当仰望耶和华。因他有慈爱，有丰盛的救恩。

lineList.en: And he shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities.
lineList.cn: 他必救赎以色列脱离一切的罪孽。
